traits.Khurgorbaeyag's Gift: Khurgorbaeyag saw fit to gift this goblin with powers that enable it to dominate others. The goblin has 1d3 other goblins that slavishly obey its orders.
traits.Nimble Escape: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.Scimitar: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
